{{short description|2019 film directed by Raja Chanda}} {{Infobox film | name = Beporowa | image = | caption = Beporowa Film Poster | director = [[Raja Chanda]] | producer = [[Eamin Haque Bobby]] | writer = | starring = {{Plainlist| * [[Ziaul Roshan]] * [[Eamin Haque Bobby]] * [[Kazi Hayat]] * [[Shahidul Alam Sachchu]] * [[Kamal]] * [[Rebeka]] }} | music = [[Dabbu]]
[[Musfiq Litu]] | cinematography = | editing = | studio = Jaaz Multimedia | distributor = [[Jaaz Multimedia]] | released = 11 August 2019 | runtime = | country = Bangladesh | language = [[Bengali language|Bengali]] | budget = | gross = }} '''''Beporowa''''' is a 2019 Bangladeshi Bengali [[action comedy film]] directed by [[Raja Chanda]]. The film was produced by [[Jaaz Multimedia]], and stars Bobby and Roshan. It is a remake of Telugu movie ''[[Bruce Lee - The Fighter|Bruce Lee The Fighter]]'' directed by [[Srinu Vaitla]] {{Cite web|url=https://www.thedailystar.net/showbiz/deshi-grapevine/news/bobbys-beporowa-1735315|title=Bobby’s Beporowa|date=2019-04-27|website=[[The Daily Star (Bangladesh)|The Daily
